src:
Video: 13 Exciting New Games Coming To Nintendo Switch In November
Gotta play 'em all
02 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Liam Doolan



November has arrived and you know what that means – it's time to journey to the Galar Region and catch 'em all. There are also plenty of other promising games coming out this month. We kick things off on 5th November with another Mario & Sonic entry. After this, there are plenty of other third-party releases to look forward to. Take a look at the full list below, or check out the video above to get a more thorough breakdown of what's arriving on the Switch this month.
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 - 5th November



The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game - 5th November



Just Dance 2020 - 5th November



Headsnatchers - 7th November



New Super Lucky's Tale - 8th November



Disney TSUM TSUM FESTIVAL - 8th November



LAYTON’S MYSTERY JOURNEY: Katrielle and the Millionaires’ Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition - 8th November



Bee Simulator - 12th November



Thief of Thieves: Season One - 12th November



Sparklite - 14th November



Pokémon Sword and Shield - 15th November



Munchkin: Quacked Quest - 19th November



Children of Morta - 20th November




What games on this list are you looking forward to playing this month? Anything you think we missed? Let us know down below!


Related Articles
